attributes.action: Allow Hendrie Fourie to stay in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Hendrie Fourie is a retired professional rugby player who has lived in the UK for 8yrs and has given his sweat and blood for England

He is not being permitted to stay in the UK as his sporting visa is no longer valid as he has been forced to retire, he has represented England internationally on residency so in my eyes he deserves to be allowed to stay in this country

Please sign and show our support
